summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBrighten, hydrate, and firm the delicate under eye area with Dermalogica's antioxidant-rich Biolumin-C Vitamin C Eye Serum.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis lightweight eye serum delivers a highly-bioavailable vitamin C complex to skin around the eyes to dramatically brighten and visibly firmExfoliates and hydrates for healthy-looking skinFormulated with antioxidants and natural botanicals designed specifically to treat fine lines, wrinkles and discoloration without irritationBeing a serum, this formula will absorb quickly and penetrate deeper into the skinRecommended for those with concerns of fine lines, wrinkles, loss of firmness and elasticity, puffiness and dark circlesKey IngredientsVitamin C Complex: enhances skin's ability to fight free radical damage and blocks environmental pollutantsChia Seed Oil: naturally tightens skin and helps to depuff eye bags and combat eye wrinkles while nourishing the delicate areaTremella Mushroom Extract: hydrates, firms, and restores skin's natural glow with vitamin D and phytosterols, which stimulate collagen production, restore barrier function and are anti-inflammatoryPapain: a natural enzyme that gently exfoliates to encourage cell renewal for brighter, smoother skinResearch ResultsThree times more brightening power than a leading competitorBrighter skin after 1 application/visibly brighter skin around the eye upon first useIncreased firmness around the eye area after 8 weeks of useItem 2556377How To UseSqueeze out a pea-sized amount from tube. Use ring finger to tap along the orbital bone morning and evening. Keep out of eyes.Tip: Formulated to work synergistically with Dermalogica's BioLumin-C Vitamin C Face Serum. Boost brightness by applying BioLumin-C Eye Serum first and finish with BioLumin-C Face Serum for an all-over luminous glow.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Sodium PCA, Trehalose, Poria Cocos Polysaccharide, Papain, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Terminalia Arjuna Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Ascorbyl Methylsilanol Pectinate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytosterols, Algin, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Phytosteryl Oleate, Tocopherol, Serine, Oleic Acid, Inositol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Betaine, Carrageenan, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Methylpropanediol, Proline, Xylitol, Calcium Gluconate, Pantolactone, Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylate-13, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyisobutene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Gluconolactone, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Carbomer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, Limonene, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount from tube. Use ring finger to tap along the orbital bone morning and evening. Keep out of eyes.Tip: Formulated to work synergistically with Dermalogica's BioLumin-C Vitamin C Face Serum. Boost brightness by applying BioLumin-C Eye Serum first and finish with BioLumin-C Face Serum for an all-over luminous glow.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Highly recommend. Turned out better than expected.

reviews.headline: works well as a base eye product
reviews.comments:
This serum is a great start to my eye routine.  I use this after a dermalogica toner, then layer the Power firm eye cream with it during the day, and with a more moisturizing eye cream at night.

Using this has made my eye area smoother and brighter.

reviews.headline: I would not repurchase
reviews.comments: So i think it did brighten my under eye area very slightly but unfortunately I did not notice a huge difference. I think I expected for my dark circles to lighten drastically and that did not occur. Overall for the price I spent, I can not recommend this product to anyone else. I also do not use everyday but more like 2x a week due to the fact I started to notice milia underneath my eye getting larger.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product to brighten the undereyes
reviews.comments: This product helps with dark under eye circles.  It minimizes it.

reviews.headline: Works really well
reviews.comments: The prduct works really well! I use both morning and night and saw the brightening effects of it relatively quickly. Maybe about two weeks? It is quite a loose consistency, more like a serum. My only con would be is that my eyes get super dry (not from the product) but because of the consistency it doesn't moisturize as much as I need it to on my really bad days. I pair it with the Good Molecules brightening eye cream for the bad days and they both go on wonderfully together. Would definitely recommend. This can be your only eye product as long as you dont struggle with dry eyes like me. :)

reviews.headline: Works really well
reviews.comments: The prduct works really well! I use both morning and night and saw the brightening effects of it relatively quickly. Maybe about two weeks? It is quite a loose consistency, more like a serum. My only con would be is that my eyes get super dry (not from the product) but because of the consistency it doesn't moisturize as much as I need it to on my really bad days. I pair it with the Good Molecules brightening eye cream for the bad days and they both go on wonderfully together. Would definitely recommend. This can be your only eye product as long as you dont struggle with dry eyes like me. :)

reviews.headline: Bye Dark Under Eyes
reviews.comments: Whether you slept well the night before or not, you're gonna look like you got the best sleep of your life every morning when using thisâ€¦

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: I have been usong Dermalogica Multivitamin Power Firm for a few years and I really love but I wanted to try this produce for my dark circles. It is very watery and it has the consistency of Olay Vitamin C serum, but more watered down. I have been using it for 2 weeks with no results hopefully I start to see some brighten effects soon. I would not buy again especially with the price, I was hoping to get more out of this product not just a pricey knock off of vitamin c serum. I will be going back to the multivitamin power firm. If i see any results I will give an update!

reviews.headline: Worthless
reviews.comments: Dried my skin out. Was flaky. Made the appearance look worse. Horrible product. I used for two months to give it a fair chance. Save your money. Do not buy.

reviews.headline: Don't think, just BUY!
reviews.comments: This eye serum is absolutely fantastic. I have uneven, Indian, 40-year-old eyes with classically dark circles under my eyes. This serum is literally the only product I have ever used that lightened up the circles. I keep it in my mini beauty fridge to keep it cold, and I press the bottle very lightly to get a half-pea sized drop for both eyes. BE CAREFUL WHEN PRESSING THE BOTTLE because a huge glob WILL come out and that's a total waste. This product lightened my under-eyes to the point where I had to select a different shade of concealer. It's amazing! I wait a minute or so for the product to absorb, then I follow up with an eye cream, day and night.

reviews.headline: Miracle Worker
reviews.comments: I have naturally dark skin around my eyes from genetics and it's always been an insecurity. I was recommended this product and was very skeptical, and also was nervous about taking a risk on something so pricey. But I'm so glad I did! Don't get me wrong, I still have darker skin around my eyes, but it's atleast 3xs lighter and I no longer look like I have "raccoon eyes." I've also been using dermalogica's exfoliator (safely around my eyes and I have sensitive skin) that may be helping as well. Regardless, I noticed extreme results within about a week and a half.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I got so excited when i saw the reviews i got it i did not see any difference also, does not look good with makeup and so expensive for that poor product

reviews.headline: Works for me!
reviews.comments: I have tried several other brands, and found this to keep hydration and soften lines around eye area. Most importantly, it Doesn't dry me out like others! I no issues with negative skin reaction. Sold.

reviews.headline: Made me break out
reviews.comments: Was disappointed at the breakout around my eyes, for a product designed to put around your eyes.  Was pricey too!

reviews.headline: Finally found something for dark circles
reviews.comments:
I was NOT gifted this, I paid for it after loving several other dermalogica products. I was on the fence for awhile and skeptical about how many people were gifted it.

I've had issues with dark circles my whole life but they've been worse the last few years with age. I was amazed at the difference this has made with brightening under my eyes. I've been using it since July and I still love it. It doesn't make up for a night with little sleep but overall my eyes are brighter. I've also noticed that it's lightened the 2 dark sun spots I have next to my eye. I do feel it works and have recommended it to my friends and family. I only use a small pea amount under each eye at night. Squeeze slowly bc it has a tendency come out in a big glob which is then wasteful. I'm not sure how it would look under makeup but from the way it dries on my skin, I believe it would be fine. I did see some negative reviews about the way it dried but I'm wondering if there's an interaction with other products.

Full disclosure: I've also been using this with Sunday Riley's Good Genes which also contributes to lightening dark spots.

reviews.headline: The best product for increase The brighter of the skin
reviews.comments:
The results with BioLumin - C gifted by Dermalogica are really amazing. After just few weeks using the serum the firmness around the eye area increase. My skin is brighter now. 
I really feel the impact in my faceâ€¦ the luminous glow applying BiuLumin-C is recognizable after few applications ðŸ˜„

reviews.headline: Worth the purchase
reviews.comments: Need very little product.  I use pea size to Pat under eyes and toward temple area.  I feel my eyes are more hydrated and brighter even tho I am in my 60s.

reviews.headline: Life Changing
reviews.comments: I'm in my early 40s and have struggled with dark circles my entire life. No eye serum or eye cream has ever helped with my dark circles. This eye serum is life changing. It's literally lightened (in about a week) my dark circles to the point to where I need only a tiny bit of concealer. I also love how it can be used under my eye creams (I use for fine lines and moisturizing). Highly recommend this serum if you struggle with dark circles like me. I'm becoming obsessed with the Dermalogica brand.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: I received the Biolumin-C Eye Serum complimentary from Dermalogica. The serum is light weight, it applies and layers nicely under makeup. It gets absorbed easily, and provides hydration while making my eye area look brighter and lively.

reviews.headline: Magic in a tiny application
reviews.comments: This really helped with my wrinkles around my eyes. I mean you will never make a wrinkle disapear without some help from a doctor. Until i can afford that , this fits the bill. Yet pricey , a tiny bad goes a long way. it absorbs fast , no greasy feel . It works for me as I am starting to notice the worry lines. Its not a potion but it really smooths out the lines making you 10 years younger.....as long as you treat your body right.

media.headline: Best Eye Serum I ever tried

faceoff_positive.comments: Dermalogica kindly gifted me this product for my honest review. I've been using this Dermalogica Biolumin-C Eye Serum for a few weeks now and i have to say im pretty happy with my results! The skin around my eyes feel so nice, hydrated, they're also noticeably brighter and overall look more awake! I love the fact that this serum doesn't cause any irritation what so ever, as it is hard for me to find products for the eye area that don't cause issues but with this eye serum I've had no issues with irritation at all which im very happy about! The texture is very nice and it has a lightweight consistency that absorbs right into the skin! Overall, since using the product I can definitely say my under eye area is much more healthy looking, I will definitely be purchasing a tube before I run out of it as I love the brightening effect I'm seeing with this Dermalogica Eye Serum!
faceoff_positive.headline: my eyes look so much more awake and ready for the day!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm a married 46 year old lady. We have two boys 6 & 4. I've always used a night time lotion before bed every night. I've tried many serum's over the years with no eval. Even though, I haven't used any new eye serums in the past couple of years. After some consideration, I decided to give dermalogica a try with an open mind. After the 4th night, I began to have some burning underneath my eyes. As most people know that use eye serums, they all tend to burn a little bit after a couple of applications. So after the 5th night, the burning picked up considerably. It wasn't intolerable. I figured that I had applied just a little too much on that night. So, wanting to give it my best shot I decided to go ahead and continue to use it. On the 6th night, I was careful to make sure I applied the correct amount. The burning continued and the burning increased and became painful. I decided at that moment to discontinue use. After a week, I developed what look like a bump under my left eye. It was really big and not anything that you could hide by makeup. I was terrified to even leave the house. It's been over three weeks and I still have the bump, even if it is a bump. It's been very painful, needless to say. For me to recommed the serum as a product that works as described, I cannot at this time. I cannot say that I recognized a decrease in fine lines and etc., but I chalk that up to not being able to use the product as recommended due to the issues I experienced. I would suggest that you read other reviews regarding the effectiveness of dermalogica. Wish I could be of more help. Thank you for taking the time to read my review.
faceoff_negative.headline: A very honest review.
